ComicInfo.Summary:
“A FULL CONFESSION”
Solve one murder, uncover thousands.
Story Content:
[2016a] - (Yes, They Are Sharks)To Insure Prompt Service[2016b] - (But At Least They Are Our Sharks)[G.D.W.P.]Look At What They Did[This Is All Very Illegal] - (Unauthorized Recording of Suspect)Punish All Slaves[Consume][Dramatis Personae][Frontier]Note: "[Frontier]" is a preview to an upcoming series from Jonathan Hickman that isn't actually related to The Black Monday Murders.
